casebody.data:
BOLLARD & ASSOCIATES, INC.
v.
H & R INDUSTRIES, INC. and Harry Schmidt and Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. Petition of: Gary Schmidt, Participant No. 511 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. February 7, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 7th day of February, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
